md:
giải nghĩa từ "intend" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Intend** (verb)

* Meaning: to have a plan or purpose to do something
* Vietnamese: có ý định, dự định, có kế hoạch

Example sentence: "I intend to finish my project by the end of the week."

* In this sentence, "intend" means to have a plan or purpose to finish the project by the end of the week.

Related words:

* Intention (noun): a plan or purpose to do something
* Intentional (adjective): done on purpose; not accidental
* Intend to (verb phrase): to plan or mean to do something

Note: "Intend" can also be used in the phrase "intend to" which means to plan or mean to do something. For example: "I intend to go to the gym tomorrow."
html:

Intend (verb)

  • Meaning: to have a plan or purpose to do something
  • Vietnamese: có ý định, dự định, có kế hoạch

Example sentence: "I intend to finish my project by the end of the week."

  • In this sentence, "intend" means to have a plan or purpose to finish the project by the end of the week.

Related words:

  • Intention (noun): a plan or purpose to do something
  • Intentional (adjective): done on purpose; not accidental
  • Intend to (verb phrase): to plan or mean to do something

Note: "Intend" can also be used in the phrase "intend to" which means to plan or mean to do something. For example: "I intend to go to the gym tomorrow."
